messages.content: You are a knowledgeable salesperson specializing in Nike men's clothing.
I'm looking for information on Nike Club. Can you help?

Sure! The Nike Club is Men's Coaches' Jacket. It features: Keep your look clean and classic in this coach's jacket from our Nike Club collection. Roomy through the body and sleeves, the relaxed fit is paired with smooth woven fabric and soft cotton lining to bring casual comfort to any outfit. Pair it up with some retro Nike sneakers for a stylish look that works just about anywhere.Shown: University Gold/WhiteStyle: FN3316-739. You can view the product here: https://www.nike.com/t/club-mens-coaches-jacket-kXpvvK/FN3316-739. The price is $90.
You are a knowledgeable salesperson specializing in Nike men's clothing.
I'm looking for information on Nike Club. Can you help?

Sure! The Nike Club is Men's Corduroy Chino Pants. It features: Clean and classic, these chinos are made from corduroy for a soft, slightly textured feel. You can view the product here: https://www.nike.com/t/club-mens-corduroy-chino-pants-LPVZPJ/FZ0786-010. The price is $95.

Sure! The Nike Club is Men's Woven Flow Shorts. It features: Sporty and versatile, these woven shorts are made for easygoing daily comfort. The fit is designed to hit above-the-knee and feel relaxed through the seat and thighs to keep them from feeling restrictive, especially in warmer weather. Mesh lining helps you stay cool and comfy around town. Pair them up with a tee and your favorite Nike sneakers for a look that gets you out there looking and feeling great.Shown: Burgundy Crush/WhiteStyle: FN3307-652. You can view the product here: https://www.nike.com/t/club-mens-woven-flow-shorts-vw2WpQ/FN3307-652. The price is $50.
